channel.title: Some Bugs I come accross
channel.description:
Not sure if they have been listed or noted. I will post it anyways.
-When opening Black Mesa, I get Node graph out of date, it happens with ever map load.
-Main Menu: Options does not work. As in it does not open
-Tram: Upon Gordon's Arrival, the guard is supposed to open the door for you. This doesn't happen. There is no guard, at all. Also note, upon arrival the game doesn't load the next map. Maybe the cause of this issue. Regardless as I was arriving where was no guard.
I currently have every single half-life game out there. I have Source Base 2006-2007, SourceSDK.
I also tried running Source 2007 from the Tools section, looks just like Half-Life: Lost Coast in the menu screen. But yea.
AMD Sempron 3000+ 1.99ghz Windows 7 Enterprise 2gb Ram NVIDIA GeForce 9400GT 2GB
Do Help Please.

item.description:
Have you tried re-downloading it from a different server?

Read full topic

item.title: Some Bugs I come accross
item.dc:creator: Durpy337
item.description:
Disturbulator:

The Immediate option you should attempt is to Delete what you’ve got, and to Reinstal Black Mesa.

Chances are, if you left your computer Idle for too long while the file downloaded, and it went into ‘sleep’ mode, some portions were left out of the Download; or some things in general didn’t get downloaded//transferred at all.

If the Problem persists, it may be a hardware issue; your machine does not look too optimal to be running Black Mesa at a desirable level, but I’ve seen some crappier machines run it as well.

I installed the game twice, computer doesn’t go in sleep mode. My CPU is fine running Source Engine. So I really don’t know whats wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Bugs I come accross
item.dc:creator: Disturbulator
item.description:
The Immediate option you should attempt is to Delete what you’ve got, and to Reinstal Black Mesa.

Chances are, if you left your computer Idle for too long while the file downloaded, and it went into ‘sleep’ mode, some portions were left out of the Download; or some things in general didn’t get downloaded//transferred at all.

If the Problem persists, it may be a hardware issue; your machine does not look too optimal to be running Black Mesa at a desirable level, but I’ve seen some crappier machines run it as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Bugs I come accross
item.dc:creator: Durpy337
item.description:
Not sure if they have been listed or noted. I will post it anyways.

-When opening Black Mesa, I get Node graph out of date, it happens with ever map load.

-Main Menu: Options does not work. As in it does not open

-Tram: Upon Gordon’s Arrival, the guard is supposed to open the door for you. This doesn’t happen. There is no guard, at all. Also note, upon arrival the game doesn’t load the next map. Maybe the cause of this issue. Regardless as I was arriving where was no guard.

I currently have every single half-life game out there. I have Source Base 2006-2007, SourceSDK.

I also tried running Source 2007 from the Tools section, looks just like Half-Life: Lost Coast in the menu screen. But yea.

AMD Sempron 3000+ 1.99ghz
Windows 7 Enterprise
2gb Ram
NVIDIA GeForce 9400GT 2GB

Do Help Please.

Read full topic
